newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks close steady on profit taking.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks close steady on profit taking.

text.p: Dhaka stocks closed steady on Tuesday as investors booked profits, halting weeks of bull-run over political stability, brokers said.
"There had been an abnormal rise in euphoric trading over the past several sessions. Investors cashed in gains today when the market saw record volume of trading," said one broker.
The Dhaka Stock Exchange benchmark index rose 0.5 points or 0.0028 percent to 2,087.38 on a turnover of 402.2 million taka.
Of the 115 issues traded, 69 ended up, 45 closed down and one was unchanged. Beximco Pharma fell 25.90 to 254.10, Bata Shoe lost 62.55 to 277.66 and BD Lamps gained 89.25 to 7,989.25.
